name: Codedose
tagline: Bespoke software experts and Java consultants.
description:
About us:
We are a boutique software house specialising in building bespoke solutions and integration systems for clients located in the Western Europe and the US. Our development centre is located in the beatiful city of Wroclaw, Poland.
Our long standing vision is to apply software solutions to resolve real-world business problems with top-notch technology choices.
Why CODEDOSE?
Solid track record of delivering complex software projects
Comprehensive service starting from analysis to deployment and support
Agile development approach with SCRUM
Affordable rates at nearshore location
Our services:
Custom software solutions
Nearshore outsourcing of Java developers
Big data, data analytics and grid computing solutions
Salesforce integrations and custom solutions
We are certified MuleSoft (Mule ESB) developers
Cooperation models:
Project team: we build and manage the project team to execute your project
Staff augmentation: our developers join your team led by your technical manager
The rules are simple:
You can build or extend your software team with experienced developers at affordable rates
We usually start with a few days on-site visit to kick off the project
No time wasted on recruitment and training, we are ready to jump into your project
All developers have excellent English communication skills
Daily Skype and IM make your team work together
Transparent cooperation terms: daily rate, NDA agreement, satisfaction guarantee, no lock-ins
